discord.greetingssystem.channel.set.message: Greeting announcements will now be made in channel $1

discord.greetingssystem.join.message.set.message: Join announcements message has been set to: $1.

discord.greetingssystem.joinrole.set.message: Default role has been set to $1

discord.greetingssystem.part.message.set.message: Part announcements message has been set to: $1.

discord.greetingssystem.usage.message: Usage: !greetingssystem [jointoggle / parttoggle / joinmessage / partmessage / joinrole / channel]
